lessons.title: Introduction to PHP
lessons.note: PHP is a popular server-side scripting language designed for web development.

lessons.title: Echo Statement
lessons.note: Outputs text or variables to the browser.

lessons.title: Variables & Data Types
lessons.note: PHP supports strings, integers, floats, booleans, arrays, and objects.

lessons.title: Switch Statement
lessons.code:
<?php
switch ($status) {
  case 'active': echo 'Active'; break;
  case 'inactive': echo 'Inactive'; break;
  default: echo 'Unknown';
}
?>

lessons.title: Loops
lessons.note: PHP supports for, while, do...while, and foreach loops.

lessons.title: User-defined Functions
lessons.note: Functions are reusable blocks of code.

lessons.title: Return Values
lessons.note: Functions can return values using return.

lessons.title: Type Declarations
lessons.note: PHP 7+ allows scalar type hints and return types.

lessons.title: Constructor Property Promotion
lessons.note: Define and assign properties directly in the constructor.
lessons.code:
<?php
class User {
  public function __construct(
    private string $name,
    private int $age
  ) {}
}
?>
